conbody.p: The product name is PHEMI Central.
The web GUI is called the Management and Governance Console.
The RESTful API is called the RESTful API.
The DPF Engine is called the DPF Engine.
The DPF Framework is called the DPF Framework.
The Policy Enforcement Engine is called the Policy Enforcement Engine.
The admin role is called the PHEMI Administrator.
The data analyst role is called the Data Analyst.
The privacy officer role is called the Privacy Officer.
